channel.title: Your current usage?
channel.description: what is the current amount of diskspace and bandwidth you have used and if you are considering a new host what would you look for? thanks for your time tom (this is just to help me price my packages)

item.title: Your current usage?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Bluehost is one of the best, though Site5 is also very good http://www.site5.com/

I myself get hosting at knownhost.com, they’re a fairly new company, same one that hosts SRL, it’s pretty expensive though, but it’s not the most expensive and they’ve got good customer service…

Disk Usage: 959.99/5000 MB
Bandwidth: 14321.72/40000.00 MB

Read full topic

item.title: Your current usage?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:17, topic:212552”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=279924.msg2277896#msg2277896 date=1213548681]
I pay $2.50 a month for 2.5gb of space, 250gb bandwidth and get all of these features:[/quote]

You coulda stated your host… Btw that sounds like mad overselling.[/quote]

I don’t advertise. The other thing being their a small company, so you get to know the people who run it very, very well.
They offer dedicated and VPSs to members only (if they’ve known you long enough) so it’s not like some random idiot with a reseller hosting package if that’s what you think ;).

All hosting companies oversell though.

Read full topic

item.title: Your current usage?
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:21, topic:212552”]http://www.bluehost.com/

best host I have seen so far.[/quote]

You’ve got to be joking me.

Bluehost sucks, look at their terms of service.

https://www.bluehost.com/terms_of_service.html

Foul language and profanity in the site content, and in the domain name are prohibited.

So that means that if I posted this post on a bluehost server, the owner could have his site taken down.

FUCK. Oops, I used profanity. I sure hope mitb isn’t a bluehost customer.

Read full topic

item.title: Your current usage?
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

  • 500 megabytes of storage space
  • 10,000 megabytes of monthly transfer (10Gb’s)
  • 3 FTP Accounts
  • 10 E-Mail accounts w/spam block
  • 5 MySQL Databases
  • 1 Sub Domain
  • 1 Parked Domain

It comes with a bunch of other stuff, but that’s just what it says on the site.

Greeny: Who’s your host?

item.title: Your current usage?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I pay $2.50 a month for 2.5gb of space, 250gb bandwidth and get all of these features:
* Free Domain or Transfer!
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* Unlimited Subdomains
* Unlimited Parked Domains
* Unlimited Addon Domains
* Unlimited FTP Accounts
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* Unlimited Mailing Lists

* PHP, Perl, & CGI
* Webmail
* SpamAssassin
* Forwarders
* Auto Responders
* Customizable MX Entry
* Email Authentication
* Backups
* File Manager
* FTP Session Control
* Web/FTP Stats

* Raw Access Logs
* Password Protect Directories
* IP Deny Manager
* HotLink Protection
* Leech Protect
* GnuPG Keys
* Redirects
* phpMyAdmin
* Remote MySQL
* CGI Center
* Site Software
* Perl Modules
* PHP PEAR Packages
* PHP Configuration
* Fantastico De Luxe
* Apache Handlers
* Image Manager
* Index Manager
* Cron jobs
* FrontPage Extensions
* Network Tools
* MIME Types

I can have applications hosted, excellent, fast & friendly customer support and you will never create anything better.

I’m basically trying to say give up on the webhosting business unless you happen to own a datacentre or have some really cool niche.

Read full topic
